Creator TommyB built their own “Steam Controller 2” from scratch, complete with touchpads, open source plans, and a retro vibe that actually works. Linus and Luke discuss the project and why Valve really should’ve made something like this.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eVP_Zj2Iaw0

title: This Is What Valve Should’ve Made

After nearly 40 years, Microsoft is replacing the iconic Blue Screen of Death with a black one. Linus and Luke discuss whether this change makes any real sense or if it’s just a needless rebranding of something everyone already understood.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eVP_Zj2Iaw0

title: Microsoft Is Killing The Blue Screen

The Trump organization launched a phone with promises of American manufacturing, and has since removed all claims of American manufacturing on their website. Linus and Luke discuss the backpedalling, odd patriotic branding, and mysterious spec changes surrounding the T1 phone.
